lead_paragraph: The executive director of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, Patrick J. Foye, said on Thursday that he was prevented from questioning an ally of the governor.

headline.print_headline: Christie Protected Culprit Behind Lane Closings, Port Authority Chief Testifies
headline.main: Chris Christie Protected Culprit in Bridge Lane Closings, Agency Head Testifies

snippet: The executive director of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, Patrick J. Foye, said on Thursday that he was prevented from questioning an ally of the governor....
abstract: Patrick J Foye testifies that he was unable to question David Wildstein, culprit behind closing of traffic lanes on George Washington Bridge in 2013, during internal review because Wildstein was protected by New Jersey Gov Chris Christie; testimony comes during trial of Bridget Anne Kelly and Bill Baroni, who are accused of covering up plot to close access lanes on bridge.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
